description: Steal any stat buffs on the enemy, then deal Medium Physical Steel Damage to them. Applies on-hit effects.
name: Arsène
note:
<Multiple Elements: Steel, On-Hit Effects>
<Cooldown: 1>

<Before Eval>
// Initialize the HP value.
var steal = 0;
// Loop through all 8 parameters.
for (var i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
  // If it is a buff, copy buff and then remove it on target
  if (target._buffs[i] > 0) {
	user._buffs[i] = target._buffs[i] > user._buffs[i] ? target._buffs[i] : user._buffs[i];
	user._buffTurns[i] = target._buffTurns[i] > user._buffTurns[i] ? target._buffTurns[i] : user._buffTurns[i];
	target._buffs[i] = 0;
	steal++;
  }
}
//Loop through all states
  var states = target.states();
  for (var i = 0; i < states.length; ++i) {
    var checkState = states[i];
    // Check if currently loop state exists and if the state is categorized as a Positive Status
    if (checkState && checkState.category.contains('POSITIVE STATUS')) {
		user.addState(checkState.id);
		user._stateTurns[checkState.id] = target._stateTurns[checkState.id];
		target.removeState(checkState.id);
      steal++;
    }
  }
// If steal at least 1 stat, display
if (steal > 0) {
  // Play an animation.
  target.startAnimation(58);
   SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText("Stole " + steal + " bonuses from the target!")
}
</Before Eval>

description: \}Clear freezes time for all enemies, locking them in place for 2 turns(3 when Overcharged) and cleansing herself of all debuffs. During the time freeze, Clear is guarenteed to critically strike enemies hit.
name: Toki yo Tamare
note:
<Multiple Elements: Ankh>
<Skill Tier: 2>

<TP Cost: 100>
<Custom TP Cost> 
cost = user.tp > 100 ? user.tp : 100;
</Custom TP Cost>


<Before Eval>
user.removeStateCategory('NEGATIVE STATUS');
// Loop through all 8 parameters.
for (var i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
  if (user._buffs[i] < 0) {
	user._buffs[i] = 0;
  }
}
target.addState(34);
if (user.isStateAffected(10)) {
target._stateTurns[34] += 1;
}
//Loop through all states
  var states = target.states();
  for (var i = 0; i < states.length; ++i) {
    var checkState = states[i];
    // Check if currently loop state exists and if the state is categorized as a Positive Status
    if (checkState.id !== 34) {
		target._stateTurns[checkState.id] += target._stateTurns[34];
    }
  }
  if (target._buffs[i] != 0) {
	target._buffTurns[i] += target._stateTurns[34];
  }
</Before Eval>

note:
<TP Cost: 100>

cost = user.tp > 100 ? user.tp : 100;

<Pre-Damage Eval>
if (a.isStateAffected(10)) {
this.item().effects[0].value1 = 0.6;
} else {
this.item().effects[0].value1 = 0.4;
}
if (b.isStateAffected(110) || b.isStateAffected(112)) {
this.item().effects[0].value1 = this.item().effects[0].value1/10;
}
if (b.isStateAffected(113)) {
this.item().effects[0].value1 = 0;
}
console.log(this.item().effects[0].value1);
</Pre-Damage Eval>

description: Reverse Buffs and Debuffs on target enemy.
name: overwrite()
note:
<Before Eval>
// Make a loop that goes through the 8 parameters.
for (var i = 0; i < 8; ++i) {
  // Set the target's buffs/debuffs to equal 0 if they don't exist.
  target._buffs[i] = target._buffs[i] || 0;
  // Check if the target is either buffed or debuffed.
  if (target.isBuffAffected(i) || target.isDebuffAffected(i)) {
    // Flip it around!
    target._buffs[i] *= -1;
  }
}
</Before Eval>

description: \}Monarch becomes invincible for 1 turn. Any enemy who would attack her with a Physical attack this turn will be Poisoned for 5 turns, dealing 5% of their maximum HP at the end of the turn. +3 Priority
name: Baneful Bunker

description: \}Once per combat, when Monarch would die while having at least 100 Momentum, she instead revives 10% Max HP\fs[10](+1% per Momentum above 100, max. 40%)\fs[12] and drains MT. For 10 turns afterwards she gains 1 Stage of AD and AP. If at 200 Momentum, she can revive again.
name: Undying Cancer

description: Strikes each enemy once with Heavy Physical Wind Damage. If a foe was slain by this ability, the Power of this ability is increased by 20% until the end of the turn.
name: Vendeval
note:
<Multiple Elements: Wind, On-Hit Effects>
<Cooldown: 3>
<Damage Formula>
// Set the chain multiplier to a value if it doesn't exist.
this._chainmultiplier = this._chainmultiplier || 1.2;
// This is the damage formula.
value = this._chainmultiplier;
</Damage Formula>

<Custom Target Eval>
// Adds the selected target to the target list.
targets.push(target);
var foes = user.isActor() ? $gameTroop : $gameParty;
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// Remove the target from the group of candidates.
members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = members.length;
console.log(extraTargets);
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
    // Remove the member as a viable candidate.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

<Post-Damage Eval>
if (target.hp <= 0) {
  this._chainmultiplier = this._chainmultiplier || 1.2;
  this._chainmultiplier = this._chainmultiplier * 1.2;
}
</Post-Damage Eval>

description: Deal Severe Magical Energy Damage to 1 enemy. Reduce the target's Speed by 1 stage for 3 turns. +1 Priority.
name: Cero

description: Stun the enemy and reduce their Speed by 1 Stage for 2 turns.
name: Trepadora

description: Deal Medium Physical Wind Damage, then immediately attempt escape from the battle if possible. Damage is calculated using the user's Speed instead of their Attack.
name: Giro
note:
<Multiple Elements: Wind, On-Hit Effects>
<Cooldown: 5>
<Damage Formula>
var rate = a.agi/a.atk;
value = rate*0.6;
</Damage Formula>

<Post-Damage Eval>
var foes = user.isActor() ? $gameTroop : $gameParty;
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
if (members.length > 0) {
//Loop through all states
  var blocked = 0;
  var states = user.states();
  for (var i = 0; i < states.length; ++i) {
    var checkState = states[i];
    // Check if currently loop state exists and if the state is categorized as a Positive Status
    if (checkState && checkState.category.contains('CANNOT ESCAPE')) {
      blocked = 1;
    }
  }
//Test Speed
if (blocked == 0) {
var esc = 0.5 * $gameParty.agility() / $gameTroop.agility();
esc = Math.max(0.1,Math.min(0.8,esc));
var success = (Math.random() < esc);
if (user.isActor()) {
blocked = success ? 0 : 2;
} else {
blocked = success ? 2 : 0;
}
}
if (blocked == 0) {
if(BattleManager.isNetworkBattlePvP()) {
BattleManager._forceEndPvP();
} else {
if (user.isActor()) {
    BattleManager._abortBattleCommandFromNetwork();
} else {
user.escape();
}
}
} else if (blocked == 1) {
   SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText("Escape was stopped!");
} else {
   SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText("Failed to escape!");
}
}
</Post-Damage Eval>

// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.

a._ipstacks = a._ipstacks || 0;
a._ipstacks += 3;
} else {
a._ipstacks = a._ipstacks || 0;
a._ipstacks++;
}
}
</After Eval>

description: \}Summons a Tidal Wave under all enemies, dealing Medium Magical Water Damage to them immediately. For the next 3 turns, enemies take 8% of their maximum HP at the end of the turn, have their Speed and Magic Resist lowered by 1 Stage for 1 turn, and cannot escape.
name: Tidal Wave

name: Pirate

description: Deals Severe(Extreme when Overcharged) Magical Water Damage to all enemies. \}Deal bonus true damage equal to 10% of the target's maximum health for every debuffed stat or Negative Status Effect on the target.
name: Golden Wild Hunt
note:
<TP Cost: 100>
<Custom TP Cost> 
cost = user.tp > 100 ? user.tp : 100;
</Custom TP Cost>
<Skill Tier: 2>


<After Eval>
// Initialize the HP value.
var hp = 0;
// Loop through all 8 parameters.
for (var i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
  // If it is a debuff...
  if (target._buffs[i] < 0) {
    // Then increase the healing by a formula.
    hp += 1;
  }
}
hp += target.getStateCategoryAffectedCount('NEGATIVE STATUS');
// Check if the HP change is positive...
// Check if the HP amount isn't 0...
if (hp !== 0) {
	var hp2 = Math.round((target.mhp*0.1)*hp);
  // Alter the target's HP.
  target.gainHp(-hp2);
  // Start the damage popup for the target.
  SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText('Bonus True Damage: ' + hp2);
  //target.startDamagePopup();
}
// Clear the target's results.
</After Eval>

description: Deals Severe Magical Energy Damage to all enemies. Power is halved against Players and Bosses.

description: Gain Momentum and MP equal to 20 + 20 for each buff/debuff on all foes. Cleanse all buffs and debuffs from all foes.
name: Laugh
note:
<Cooldown: 8>

<After Eval>
// Initialize the HP value.
var bst = 0;
// Loop through all 8 parameters.
for (var i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
  // If it is a debuff...
  if (target._buffs[i] != 0) {
    // Then increase the healing by a formula.
    bst += 1;
  }
target.buffs[i] = 0;
}
// Check if the HP change is positive...
// Check if the HP amount isn't 0...
if (bst !== 0) {
var bst2 = bst*20;
  // Alter the target's HP.
  user.gainTp(bst2);
  user.gainMp(bst2);
  // Start the damage popup for the target.
  SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText('Those meant nothing to the monster!');
  //target.startDamagePopup();
}
// Clear the target's results.
</After Eval>

 // Reset the buff to neutral.

}

} else {
a.addState(29);
};
</Before Eval>

description: Has a chance to instantly kill the target. Range is between 1% to 100%. If the foe is lower than 80% HP, the rate increases from 1% all the way to 100% when the foe is at 20% HP. Percentage is additionally modified by up to 20% Increase/Decrease based on the Luck of the user and target.
name: smite()
note:
<Cooldown: 6>

<Before Eval>
var deathRate = 0.01
if (b.hpRate() <= 0.8) {
deathRate = 1.0 - b.hpRate();
} 
deathRate = Math.min(0.8, deathRate);
this.item().effects[0].value1 = deathRate;
console.log(this.item().effects[0].value1);
<Before Eval>

description: Deal 9999 true damage to all enemies. Fails on Players, Bosses, and Large Objectives.
